thread.title: YouTube Bans More Firearms Videos Amid Gun Debate

author: Douglas MacMillan
title: YouTube Bans More Firearms Videos Amid Gun Debate

organizations.name: youtube bans more firearms videos amid gun debate youtube

text:
YouTube said it would ban videos relating to the sale or assembly of guns and certain gun accessories, as tech giants face growing pressure to limit the promotion of firearms in the wake of the school shooting in Parkland, Fla.

The world’s largest video site, a division of Alphabet Inc.’s Google, said this week it would prohibit all videos which link directly to sites that sell guns or accessories known as bump stocks, which allow certain firearms to fire as rapidly as machine guns. Bloomberg News reported the policy shift,...
